text:
The following error message is displayed multiple times on startup:

"ZoneInfo: C:\j2sdk1.4.1\lib\zi\ZoneInfoMappings (The system cannot find the 
path specified)"

Tomcat should be looking under: "C:\j2sdk1.4.1\jre\lib\zi"
                                               ^^^^
(the "jre" part of the path is missing).
creator: treeck@yahoo.com

text:
Tomcat doesn't use zoneinfo so I suspect that this is not a Tomcat issue. You 
will need to provide a better justification as to why Tomcat is at fault if 
you re-open this bug report.
creator: markt@apache.org
